title: The Trial of the System
story_summary: Crowds gather in the open squares as hidden BCI logs are revealed. People listen to returnees and former officials sharing stories of abuse. After heated debate, the city decides to abolish the BCI. Citizens rebuild Stenograd together using public meetings and handwritten records.

official.headline: Orderly Debate Continues
official.anchor_line: City squares host public discussions as citizens exchange views on administration systems.
official.contextual_reframing: Community dialogue demonstrates Stenograd's capacity for constructive civic engagement.

official.headline: Systematic Review Underway
official.anchor_line: Key officials and former operators present testimony to local assemblies for review.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent review showcases the self-correcting nature of Stenograd's oversight models.

official.headline: Citizens Guide Future
official.anchor_line: Truth commissions find BCI system irredeemable; communal administration by public assembly begins.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd enters a new era of democratic resilience and shared responsibility.

underground.headline: System on Trial
underground.anchor_line: Crowds pour into city squares for truth commissions the state never wanted you to see.
underground.contextual_reframing: Testimonies and leaked logs expose how deep the BCI's quiet control really went. Silence is breaking.

underground.headline: Secrets Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Hidden logs and fresh witness accounts reveal targeted detentions and quiet punishments.
underground.contextual_reframing: Citizens now see what the Council worked so hard to conceal. Eyes are open. No going back.

underground.headline: BCI Falls, People Rise
underground.anchor_line: The people condemn the BCI as irredeemable. Handwritten records and open assemblies return.
underground.contextual_reframing: Stenograd begins its long recovery from control. This time, every voice counts.
